description: New surveillance software will help French police enforce mask-wearing and social distancing.
title: Coronavirus France: Cameras to monitor masks and social distancing
title_page: Coronavirus France: Cameras to monitor masks and social distancing - BBC News
maintext: Many artificial intelligence (AI) innovations are being adopted worldwide in the rush to stop the spread of Covid-19, and use of these tools, under emergency laws, has raised the alarm about possible invasions of privacy.
